actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President call a White House Conference on the American Family.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President call a White House Conference on the American Family in order to establish a national understanding of the role played by marriage and the family in the development of a viable society.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President call a White House Conference on the American Family.
